_nsgTarget.nsgqlString: SELECT device,NsgRegion FROM processUptime WHERE (NsgRole = 'agent') AND $_timeFilter LIMIT 100, 0
SELECT device,SoftwareRev as `version`,tslast(metric) as `tslast_metric` FROM processUptime WHERE (NsgRole = 'aggregator') AND $_timeFilter ORDER BY `device` DESC LIMIT 100, 0

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "freeTime" WHERE "Role.NetSpyGlassServer" = '1' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "deviceName" fill(null)

panels.description: Interval of time between beginning of the cycle and the time when alert computation finishes
panels.title: Alerts Lag

panels.description: Time it takes to compute all alerts, per server
panels.title: Alerts Compute Time

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "cpuUsage" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "jvmMemTotal" WHERE "Role.NetSpyGlassServer" = '1' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "deviceName" fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "jvmMemFree" WHERE "Role.NetSpyGlassServer" = '1' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "deviceName" fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "GCCountRate" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "deviceName" fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "GCTimeRate" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "deviceName" fill(null)

list.name: region
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT NsgRegion FROM numVars ORDER BY NsgRegion
